name: ProjectChimera Alpha
description:
Just a short tutorial at the moment, there are still a lot of issues with the collissions, and some problems with angles, but in terms of efficiency it works, this idea could be turned into something less embarrassing for later, when i add the first few levels to try something out with them.

Background Story

Game is about Humans and Anthros in a continent invaded by species from another one, these species aren´t zombies or mutants, they evolved naturally, but they are way more enhanced for survival, so they easily demolished this continent´s stability. Your mission as human is to go for your family which was sent far into a bunker for protection, but haven´t heard of it in months, lead you to become worried and now you seek to find them, in your way you encounter a female Anthro who is in a similar mission and also going to the same direction, so both travel together for more protection, just to let you know humans and anthros aren´t really allies, but these 2 seem to be slowly more friendly by the days.
